languages.text: "Координаты гипотетического контакта переданы команде. Если вы желаете поддержать своих людей и дать отпор ксеносам лично, нам следует поторопиться — едва ли торговый корабль сможет долго сопротивляться врагам Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "Координаты гипотетического контакта переданы команде. Если вы желаете поддержать своих людей и дать отпор ксеносам лично, нам следует поторопиться — едва ли торговый корабль сможет долго сопротивляться врагам Человечества".

languages.text: "The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Humanity for long."
languages.original_text: "Координаты гипотетического контакта переданы команде. Если вы желаете поддержать своих людей и дать отпор ксеносам лично, нам следует поторопиться — едва ли торговый корабль сможет долго сопротивляться врагам Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Mankind for long."

"The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Mankind for long."

"The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Humanity for long."

"The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Humanity for long."

"The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Humanity for long."

languages.text: “可能发生战斗的坐标已经发送给了相关船员。如果您打算支援您的臣民，亲自抵抗异形的袭击，那我们必须抓紧时间。商船落在了人类之敌手中，恐怕无法挣扎太长时间。”
languages.original_text: "The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Humanity for long."

traits.locale_text: “可能发生战斗的坐标已经发送给了相关船员。如果您打算支援您的臣民，亲自抵抗异形的袭击，那我们必须抓紧时间。商船落在了人类之敌手中，恐怕无法挣扎太长时间。”

languages.text: «La tripulación ha recibido las coordenadas de un contacto hipotético. Si quiere ayudar a sus súbditos a rechazar personalmente a los xenos, tendrá que darse prisa. Dudo que una nave mercante pueda rechazar mucho tiempo a los enemigos de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Humanity for long."

traits.locale_text: «La tripulación ha recibido las coordenadas de un contacto hipotético. Si quiere ayudar a sus súbditos a rechazar personalmente a los xenos, tendrá que darse prisa. Dudo que una nave mercante pueda rechazar mucho tiempo a los enemigos de la Humanidad».

languages.text: "Die Koordinaten eines hypothetischen Kontakts wurden an die Crew weitergeleitet. Wenn Ihr Eure Untertanen unterstützen und persönlich gegen die Xenos kämpfen wollt, müssen wir uns beeilen ... es ist unwahrscheinlich, dass ein Handelsschiff in der Lage sein wird, den Feinden der Menschheit lange zu widerstehen."
languages.original_text: "The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Humanity for long."

traits.locale_text: "The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Humanity for long."

languages.text: « Les coordonnées d'un contact possible ont été transmises à l'équipage. Nous devons nous hâter si vous souhaitez soutenir vos sujets et combattre personnellement les xénos... Il est peu probable que le navire marchand résiste bien longtemps aux ennemis de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Humanity for long."

traits.locale_text: « Les coordonnées d'un contact possible ont été transmises à l'équipage. Nous devons nous hâter si vous souhaitez soutenir vos sujets et combattre personnellement les xénos... Il est peu probable que le navire marchand résiste bien longtemps aux ennemis de l'humanité. »

languages.text: 「仮定される接触場所の座標がクルーに転送されました。臣下に手を差し伸べて、自ら異種族に反撃するのであれば、急いだ方がよろしいかと。商船が人類の敵に長く抵抗できる可能性は低いです」
languages.original_text: "The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Humanity for long."

traits.locale_text: 「仮定される接触場所の座標がクルーに転送されました。臣下に手を差し伸べて、自ら異種族に反撃するのであれば、急いだ方がよろしいかと。商船が人類の敵に長く抵抗できる可能性は低いです」

languages.text: "Olası bir temasın koordinatları, mürettebata iletildi. Tebaanızı desteklemek ve zenolara karşı bizzat savaş vermek istiyorsanız acele etmeliyiz. Tüccar gemisinin İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı uzun süre dayanma ihtimali yüksek değil."
languages.original_text: "The coordinates of a hypothetical contact have been forwarded to the crew. If you wish to support your subjects and fight back against the xenos personally, we must hurry — it is unlikely that a merchant ship will be able to resist the enemies of Humanity for long."
